ocrd-eynollah-segment.description: Segment page into regions and lines and do reading order detection with eynollah

models.description: Path to directory containing models to be used (See https://qurator-data.de/eynollah)

dpi.description: pixel density in dots per inch (overrides any meta-data in the images); ignored if <= 0 (with fall-back 230)

full_layout.description: Try to detect all element subtypes, including drop-caps and headings

light_version.description: Try to detect all element subtypes in light version (faster+simpler method for main region detection and deskewing)

curved_line.description: try to return contour of textlines instead of just rectangle bounding box. Needs more processing time

ignore_page_extraction.description: if this parameter set to true, this tool would ignore page extraction

allow_scaling.description: check the resolution against the number of detected columns and if needed, scale the image up or down during layout detection (heuristic to improve quality and performance)

allow_enhancement.description: if this parameter set to true, this tool would check that input image need resizing and enhancement or not.

textline_light.description: if this parameter set to true, this tool will try to return contoure of textlines instead of rectangle bounding box of textline with a faster method.

right_to_left.description: if this parameter set to true, this tool will extract right-to-left reading order.

headers_off.description: ignore the special role of headings during reading order detection
